entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, waving his arms to attract Moody's attention.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person who is present on the staircase and has possession of the Marauder's Map.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who tries to reach for the Marauder's Map but fails.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who turns to look at the Marauder's Map along with Snape.

relationships.description: Harry tries to attract Moody's attention by waving his arms.
Snape tries to reach for the Marauder's Map but fails.
Moody has possession of the Marauder's Map.
